overview: Life in Love is a charming slice-of-life structured documentary exploring a series of colliding Gen Z love stories. Each episode follows a different character as they navigate an important moment in their romantic life - be it saying I love you for the first time, overcoming a small conflict in a long term relationship, or giving in to the possibility of a brand new one. Our focus is always on the positive, euphoric joy of love - with our cast overcoming whatever challenges they might face, to find themselves more confident and happy in themselves and their relationships.
title: Life in Love
